name: Dragon Dollars Slots
description:
The most fun Orient themed slot machine simulation has arrived. The Fiery Dragon sets your wins aflame as you strive to win the Lucky Coin Feature and mysterious Mystic Yin Feature.

Three Jade Jewels triggers the Jade Jackpot where you can win huge virtual bucks!

3 or more scattered lucky coins during normal play will award you the Lucky Coin Feature.

Each lucky coin free game is a free spin which keeps on giving... after each spin, all non paying symbols are locked in place and all symbols on active paylines (as well as scattered coins and jade jewels) will respin. After the respin, all new pays are paid out. The respins will continue for as long as new pays occur.

To add to the excitement, mystery Golden Pagodas may appear on centre reels during the lucky coin spins and respins. Each time mystery pagodas appear they are replaced at random by a new picture symbol - most often a dragon wildcard!

A Yin/Yang symbol on the first and last reels during normal play will award the Mystic Yin Feature.

During the Mystic Yin Feature Yin/Yang symbols may appear on all reels except the first and last. After each spin the spirits of good fortune will award you one of seven special bonuses for each Yin/Yang symbol which appears!

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
